citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 PM on
10/28/2015.
Licensee was unable to leave work and her new animal caretaker was not available. The licensee will inform me of
the animal caretakers regularly scheduled hours as soon as possible.
